id=aus_autonomy
title=The Hungarian Question
desc=The biggest unrest recently has been happening in the Hungarian regions of the empire. We could offer more autonomy to them in order to settle the disputes.

image=austria_ungheria.png

show_in_missions=false
mission_image=2

only_once=true
popUp=true
possible_to_run=false

trigger_and
next_and
exists_any=atr
next_and
is_civ=atr_m
next_and
has_variable=more_autonomy
next_and
exact_day=1=9=1861
trigger_and_end

name=Yes, we shall propose the Austro-Hungarian compromise (WIP)
ai=65

option_end
